1. You can download Rodan using the automated script or you can set it up manually

1.1. Quick setup: Download using automated script

1.2. Manual setup: Follow the steps for manual setup

2. Download Rodan Client.

Get Rodan Client running by following Rodan Client wiki.

3. (Optional) Contribute to Rodan.

Fork or clone our GitHub Repository:

git clone git://github.com/DDMAL/rodan.git

git clone git://github.com/DDMAL/rodan-client.git

Send us a pull request!
